scripts.export:wp-content: npm run cli rm -- -rf .export/wp-content && mkdir -p .export/wp-content/uploads && run-p export:wp-content:*
scripts.export:db: mkdir -p .export/sql && npm run wp db -- export .export/sql/local.sql
scripts.pretest: wp-env start && npm run composer install -- --no-interaction && npm run composer install-theme
scripts.css: npm run clean:css && sass --no-source-map src/css:dist/css && postcss dist/css/*.css -r
scripts.js: npm run clean:js && npm run format && run-p js:*
scripts.zip:pack: rsync -a --exclude='/vendor' --exclude='/node_modules' --exclude='.*' --exclude='*.ruleset.xml' --exclude='*.config.js' --exclude='*.xml.dist' --exclude='/sql' --exclude='/tests'  --exclude='/uploas' --exclude='package*.json' . snow-monkey-member-post && wp-env start && npm run composer install -- --no-dev -d snow-monkey-member-post
scripts.zip: npm run clean:zip && npm run zip:pack && npm run zip:archive
scripts.make-json: rimraf languages/*.json && npm run wp i18n -- make-json ./languages/snow-monkey-member-post-ja.po --no-purge
